==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ちゅう|しょう|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From [[中]] (''chū'', "middle," "medium") + [[小]] (''shō'', "small," "little")

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ちゅうしょう}}

# [[small]] to [[medium]]

====Compounds====
* [[大中小]] (''daichūshō''): large, medium, or small
* [[中小企業]] (''chūshō kigyō''): smaller companies
* [[中小企業庁]] (''chūshō kigyō chō''): the Japanese Small and Medium Enterprise Agency
* [[中小諸国家]] (''chūshō sho-kokka''): medium and small nations
